name: ProLeadsio Inc.
description: Provider of an online sales platform designed to automate the menial tasks of sales reps through a single operator. The company's online sales platform is designed to increase the output of sales tools and processes to enables true personalization at scale and free up sales representatives' time.
one_liner: Provider of an online sales platform designed to automate the menial tasks of sales reps through a single operator. The company's online sales platform is designed to increase the output of sales tools and processes to enables true personalization at scale and free up sales representatives' time.
